attributes.action: Weekly  Covid 19 tests for care home staff, and monthly tests for residents.
attributes.background: Regular testing for covid 19, for care home staff and residents.

rejection.details:
From 31 August the Government will have made regular testing available to all care home in England: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-getting-tested

We have already published the following petition, calling for a similar action:

Make Covid-19 test kits available to all care homes, for the residents and staff: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/312785
